name: Black Diamond Hotforge Quickpack 12CM
description: The HotForge draw has a straight and a bent-gate HotForge biner threaded on a polyester dogbone. This 6-pack is a great design in a multi-purpose draw with smooth-clipping keylock nose action.Corrosion resistant anodized aluminum.Biners have a deep basket with a flattened bottom so ropes and webbing stays put.Equipped with an 18mm Polyester Dogbone with Straitjacket keeper.
